# Ensemble Network Aggregation

## Define Simulation Settings

```{r}
SIZE <- c("tiny")
#SIZE <- c("tiny","small","moderate","middle","large", "huge")
NP <- c(20, 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000)
NOISE <- c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0) 
BOOTSTRAP_COUNT <- 120

set.seed(1234)
library(knitr)
```

## Simulate Networks

```{r simulate, results='hide', message=FALSE}
sim <- knit_child("simulate/simulateNetworks.Rmd", eval=TRUE)
```

`r paste(sim, collapse = '\n')`

## Rebuild Networks

```{r rebuild, results='hide', message=FALSE}
rebuild <- knit_child("rebuild/rebuildNetworks.Rmd", eval=TRUE)
```

`r paste(rebuild, collapse = '\n')`
